summary: The Great Sphinx is an ancient statue in Egypt, carved from a huge limestone rock. It looks like a giant lion with a human head, facing east. This monumental sculpture is over 4,500 years old, built during the rule of Pharaoh Khafre. It's one of the world's most famous statues, measuring about 240 feet long and 66 feet tall. Despite a popular myth, Napoleon's army didn't break its nose; it was already missing before they arrived.
title: Great Sphinx of Giza
